localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Replace fire hydrants and traffic lights with your brand. Blend the fun and easy-to-solve maze captcha into your website. Frustrate bots, not your users. ğŸ Free for a full year for all Product Hunters who sign up in 2021.
nodes.title: Graboxy maze CAPTCHA - Brandable captcha that is fun & easy to solve

nodes.excerpt: Grapevine allows you to chat, collaborate and work in a 3D virtual space. With spatial audio, beautiful customizable 3D worlds, and loads of collaborative tools, Grapevine creates a feeling of togetherness and presence in your team. Join us in the metaverse!
nodes.title: Grapevine - Chat and work together in a 3D virtual world

nodes.excerpt: IRIS Clarity is a desktop app that uses voice isolation AI to remove those distracting background noises that often creep in. Real-time and multi-directional, Clarity allows all participants to immediately enjoy clearer sound, no matter where they are.
nodes.title: IRIS Clarity - AI voice isolation that brings clarity to your online calls
